Question: What is the value of the sum of $x_{531}$, $x_{753}$, and $x_{975}$?

direct_answer.text:
Let's think step by step. To solve this problem, let's first compute some initial terms of the sequence using the recursive definition. Here are the first six terms: \begin{align*}
x_5 &= x_4 - x_3 + x_2 - x_1\\
&= 523 - 420 + 375 - 211\\
&= 167\\
x_6 &= x_5 - x_4 + x_3 - x_2\\
&= 167 - 523 + 420 - 375\\
&= -91\\
x_7 &= x_6 - x_5 + x_4 - x_3\\
&= -91 - 167 + 523 - 420\\
&= -155\\
x_8 &= x_7 - x_6 + x_5 - x_4\\
&= -155 + 91 + 167 - 523\\
&= -520\\
x_9 &= x_8 - x_7 + x_6 - x_5\\
&= -520 - (-155) + (-91) - 167\\
&= -623.
\end{align*
